item.description:
Please contact Stan or Barry about the New Year's Eve Party! Read Info below!


Ring in the NEW YEAR with DATE ME I'M JEWISH at our second annual NEW YEARS EVE PARTY at TEMPLE HILLEL B'NAI TORAH from 7:30pm to 1am

For only $39 your complete evening includes: DJ and dancing, Kosher mediterranean dinner and desserts, wine and beer open bar (4 drink limit), unlimited soft drinks, party favors, free raffle, midnight desserts & champagne toast and more.

It's only $39 if payment is received by 12/15/08. $49 if payment received from 12/15 to 12/27. After 12/27 dinner option will not be available. $39 for party only (no dinner) at the door - arrive at 9:30.



PAY BY December 1st and you will be entered in BARRY and STAN'S FREE MOHEGAN SUN GIVEAWAY CONTEST:

One lucky winner will receive a free singles chartered bus trip to Mohegan Sun and a ticket to Bowzer's Doo-Wop concert & more on January 18, 2009, a value of approximately $70! See flier on http://singles.meetup... for details.

Don't miss this GREAT PARTY and celebrate 2009 with up to 150 singles. For more info call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049.

Please invite your friends to join us on New Year's Eve.
It's the best value in Boston!
item.name: New Years Eve Party with Date Me I'm Jewish!
